artist: Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Folded sheet from fashion periodical (P.15,706); woman at left in a yellow gown with purple accents, a blue shawl with red trim, a yellow and red fan, and a yellow hat with purple bows; woman at right in a pink gown with white and blue trim, a folded fan, and a hat with pink bows
portfolio: From Journal de la Mode et du Goût, ou amusemens du salon et de la toilette, Paris, 1790–92
title: Fashion plate from Journal de la Mode et du Goût, Vingt-cinquième Cahier, 1 Novembre 1792
